alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 20 at 12:53PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SIGNIFICANT WINTER WEATHER POSSIBLE SATURDAY INTO SUNDAY... A strong system will start affecting the area on Saturday bringing the possibility of heavy precipitation. Skagway, Haines, and the Highways will likely be cold enough for a significant amount of snow to accumulate starting Saturday afternoon. Possible snow totals could be as high as 13 inches on the higher elevations of the Haines and Klondike Highways. The towns of Haines and Skagway may also see up to 8 inches possible before the snow starts mixing with or changing to rain early Sunday. Stay tuned to the National Weather Service for updates at weather.gov/Juneau.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
